item.title: Simple geocoding component
item.description:
From jjbross@gmail.com on May 28, 2010 14:26:45
A geocoding component is by now completely lacking. It is an essential component for routing services and also for searching within the map. A first try would be extract street names from OSM, clean the data and use a TRIE data structure (e.g. PatriciaTrie) to index and compress the data. Android already offers an AutoCompleteTextView that may be used to let the user type in and choose a street.
Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/mapsforge/issues/detail?id=16

item.contents:
From jjbross@gmail.com on October 06, 2010 06:02:49
